data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Wayanad, Kerala, India to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Wayanad, Kerala, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Wayanad, Kerala, India to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 798,491 who are far from you in Wayanad, Kerala, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Wayanad, Kerala, India.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Kathikkaran people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, guide someone in the church in the county of Wayanad to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 8,991 believers in the county of Wayanad to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.section_summary:
the county of Wayanad, Kerala, India has a population of 817,400.

We estimate Wayanad has 8,991 people who might know Jesus, 9,918 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 798,491 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Wayanad, Kerala, India.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

location.name: Wayanad
location.people_groups_list: Vallan, Vallon, Mukkuvan (Muslim traditions), Shabi, Viswakarma Kallan Muppan
